effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Exhales a hot breath on the
foe. May inflict a burn.

Exhales a hot breath on the
foe. May inflict a burn.

The user exhales a
heated breath to
attack. It may also
inflict a burn.

The user exhales a
heated breath on the
foe to attack. It may
also leave the target
with a burn.

The user exhales a
heated breath on the
foe to attack. It may
also leave the target
with a burn.

The user exhales a
heated breath on the
foe to attack. It may
also leave the target
with a burn.

Le lanceur provoque une vague de
chaleur. Peut aussi brûler l’ennemi.

The user attacks by exhaling hot breath
on the opposing team. It may also leave
targets with a burn.

The user attacks by exhaling hot breath
on the opposing team. It may also leave
targets with a burn.

あつい　いきを
あいてに　ふきつけて　こうげきする。
やけど　じょうたいに　することが　ある。

뜨거운 숨결을
상대에게 내뿜어 공격한다.
화상 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

Le lanceur provoque une vague de chaleur.
Peut aussi brûler l’ennemi.

Ziele werden von Sturm aus heißer Luft getroffen
und verbrennen sich eventuell.

Provoca un viento abrasador que puede quemar al
objetivo.

Chi la usa investe i nemici che ha intorno con
una folata di vento caldo. Può anche scottarli.

The user attacks by exhaling hot breath
on the opposing Pokémon. This may also leave
those Pokémon with a burn.

熱い　息を
相手に　吹きつけて　攻撃する。
やけど状態に　することが　ある。

あつい　いきを
あいてに　ふきつけて　こうげきする。
やけど　じょうたいに　することが　ある。

뜨거운 숨결을
상대에게 내뿜어 공격한다.
화상 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

將炎熱的氣息
吹向對手進行攻擊。
有時會讓對手陷入灼傷狀態。

opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those

吹向对手进行攻击。
有时会让对手陷入灼伤状态。
